title: He's A Lot Different After 3 Drinks
itunes:title: He's A Lot Different After 3 Drinks
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I married my college sweetheart and we have had our ups and downs but cheating was never an issue in our marriage. Now I’m thinking of stepping out on my husband of 7 years. He’s a great guy and everyone loves him, when he’s not drinking. When he gets that tequila in his system, he becomes an actor, singer and porn star.......................................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
